# Answer is Chicago Bulls

Michael Jordan was born in 12/23/1957 and is a former basketball player, businessman and former professional boxer.

He is known as "His Airness" by the fans. He played 15 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). The Chicago Bulls won 6 championships.

In the business world, he is part owner and head of the Washington Wizards.
